subject: Code Snippet Test
msgSnippet: Dear Collegues, Any help in this regard will be highly appreciated (ASAP). Instructions: Please read the FAQ section and do the following: List as many
messageBody:
Dear Collegues,

Any help in this regard will be highly appreciated (ASAP).


Instructions:

Please read the FAQ section and do the following:

List as many testcases as possible. (List at a high-level of what
your are checking for and the expected results, e.g., verify x
returns y and so forth.)
Then take any one of the testcases and conform it to a junit test
code. (In other words, I should be able to literally take their
code and run it with JUnit framework.)
[FAQ]
1. What is package SpringConfig used for?


2. What does myException do?

3. Does the error code mappings dynamically change during runtime?


4. Does the spring framework get loaded only once during startup?
